## IWithFeatureOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IWithFeatureOptions extends Omit<IFeatureExecutionOptions, 'tracing'>, playwright.LaunchOptions
```

<b>Extends:</b> Omit&lt;[IFeatureExecutionOptions](./engine-test-kit.ifeatureexecutionoptions.md)<!-- -->, 'tracing'&gt;, playwright.LaunchOptions

| Property                                                                                   | Modifiers | Type                                                                           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                          |
